snippet.title: Field of Glory II Medieval || Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 Wishlist on Steam 👉 https://bit.ly/3nPHH0B
💬 Join the Discord Server 👉 https://discord.gg/H3vd5FX
🦎 More info here 👉 https://bit.ly/3lON26I

Created by Richard Bodley Scott, the undisputed king of turn-based battles, Field of Glory II Medieval expands the game system to the Medieval era. Set between 1040 AD and 1270 AD the game explores the high medieval period and introduces a wealth of tactical and strategic innovations.
